fields.title: Title
fields.depositTooltip: The deposit amount that will be bonded (partly depends on the on-chain description length)
fields.blockchainDescription: Description - this description is stored on chain (the bond will increase for each byte of this description)
fields.extendRemarkDescription: Explain why you need to extend the expiry date. This information will be included in a transaction (but not stored on-chain)

acceptModal.title: You are about to accept the curator's role
acceptModal.warningMessage: In order to accept the curator's role you need to have a deposit amount available on your account. Please note, that if you act maliciously, you may loose the deposit. The deposit will be refund upon successful bounty payout.

rejectModal.title: You are about to reject the curator's role
rejectModal.warningMessage: We take this as a sign that you are unable to do your job and willingly give up. The community could slash you, but for now they allow you to recover your deposit and exit without issue. (The community may want to change this if it is abused.)

claimPayoutModal.title: You are about to claim the payout
claimPayoutModal.warningMessage: We're happy that you've made it to this point! Thanks for your work to support the community. Submit the transaction to claim the payout.
claimPayoutModal.successMessage: Congratulations, you have just claimed the payout! The bounty was closed.

awardModal.title: You are about to award the bounty
awardModal.warningMessage:
You will now award the bounty to: {{beneficiary}}
Please notice that you will not be able to change the beneficiary address once chosen.

extendExpiry.title: You are about to extend the bounty
extendExpiry.warningMessage: The expiry date will be extended. The remark will be included in a transaction, but not stored on-chain. Make sure to choose the curator account to sign this transaction.
extendExpiry.successMessage: The bounty expiry date has been extended

polkassemblyShare.intro: This bounty was added through BrightTreasury. For more info & discussion, check

extendExpiry.cannotExtendExpiry: You cannot extend expiry date of this bounty

withTipping.title: You are about to create a tip request along with tipping

submitModal.title: You are about close the tip and make payout
submitModal.warningMessage: We're happy that you've made it to this point! Thanks for your work to support the community. Submit the transaction to claim the payout.
submitModal.successMessage: Congratulations, you have just claimed the payout! The tip is closed.
